name: Rabbit Lyrics
author: Guo Yunhe

sections.description:
Rabbit Lyrics features:

  • Three different view modes: clip, mini, full
  • Music and audio book supports
  • Translation supports
  • Karaoke highlighting
  • Jump to playback position by clicking lines
  • Built-in themes that fits official WordPress themes

Nobody Ask Questions

Why did you make it?

Just for fun.

Is it free?

Yes, forever.

Can I report bugs?

Yes. The best way is through GitHub https://github.com/guoyunhe/rabbit-lyrics-wp
sections.changelog:
0.1.0

  • First release on WordPress.org
  • Block editor supports
  • Rabbit Lyrics 2.1.1

short_description: JavaScript audio and timed lyrics synchronizer.
